title: Ultra-rich women in Europe in 2014 , by personal fortune value
yAxis: Value of wealth in billion euros
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Value of wealth in billion euros 25.1 is found at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and the minimum is found at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) where Month is 4.3.
There is a difference of 20.8 between the maximum Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and minimum Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.
Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has the highest Value of wealth in billion euros and Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) has the lowest Value of wealth in billion euros.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Value of wealth in billion euros for 10 number of Months.
The maximum Value of wealth in billion euros 25.1 is found at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and the minimum is found at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) where Month is 4.3.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Value of wealth in billion euros in the y axis.
The maximum Value of wealth in billion euros 25.1 is found at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) and the minimum is found at Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) where Month is 4.3.
Month Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany) has the second highest value for Value of wealth in billion euros.
The highest Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) has 20.8 more Value of wealth in billion euros than the lowest Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany).
Value of wealth in billion euros at Month Liliane Bettencourt (L’Oréal France) is 25.1 , second place is Susanne Klatten (BMW Germany) at 13.1, and thirdly is Johanna Quandt (BMW Germany) at 10.7.
Overall Value of wealth in billion euros has reduced over the Months.
Similar Value of wealth in billion euros is found in Month Margarita Louis Dreyfus (Louis Dreyfus Switzerland), and Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden).
The Month Elisabeth Mohn (Bertelsmann Germany) tends to be 2.89 percent lower than average.

data.Month: Antonia Axson Johnson (Axel Johnson Group Sweden)
